name: Mount Rainier | Skyline Trail
smallDescription: The trailhead is located near the entrance to the Jackson Visitor Center at Paradise, marked by stone steps inscribed with a quote by John Muir.

name: Lake Diablo
smallDescription: Mount Rainier, also known as Tahoma or Tacoma, is a large active stratovolcano in Cascadia located 59 miles south-southeast of Seattle, in Mount Rainier National Park
